import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

fig1=plt.figure()
plot1=fig1.add_axes([0,0,2,1])
plot1.bar(Blood_Types,People,color='#ad0c00')
plot1.set_xlabel('Blood Types')

source.9769077e:
x = [5,7,8,7,2,17,2,9,4,11,12,9,6]
y = [99,86,87,88,111,86,103,87,94,78,77,85,86]
fig3=plt.figure()
plot3=fig3.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
plot3.scatter(x,y,color='g')
plot3.set_title('X vs Y')
plot3.set_xlabel('X')
plot3.set_ylabel('Y')
plt.show()
